m_szDocSumamry: Stabilized anode for lithium-polymer batteries US 5648187 A Abstract The invention relates to thin film solid state electrochemical cells consisting of a lithium metal anode, a polymer electrolyte and a cathode, where the lithium anode has been stabilized with a polymer film capable of transmitting lithium ions.
